mapper.select: SELECT B.*, A.BFILENAME TITLEFILENAME, A.BFILETYPE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAVORITE F WHERE B.BNO = F.BNO AND F.FSTATUS = 'Y') FAVORITECOUNT FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN B_ATTACHMENT A ON(B.BNO = A.BNO AND A.BFILELEVEL = 0 AND BFILESTATUS= 'N') WHERE B.BSTATUS = 'N' AND (BCONTENT LIKE #{indexSearch} OR B.BTITLE LIKE #{indexSearch})
